mapper.select: SELECT mbidx , uidx , title , CONVERT(content USING UTF8) as content , writer , date , ip , category , delyn , secret FROM pea_minihome_board WHERE delyn='N' AND date(date)=#{date} AND uidx=#{uidx} ORDER BY mbidx DESC
SELECT a.* FROM pea_item a JOIN pea_user_item b ON a.iidx=b.iidx WHERE b.uidx=#{uidx} AND b.buy='Y'
